name: UIActivity.ActivityType
desc: A structure that describes the types of acitivities for which the system has built-in support.

items.name: static let addToReadingList: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that adds the URL to Safari’s reading list.

items.name: static let airDrop: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that makes the provided content available through AirDrop.

items.name: static let assignToContact: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that assigns the image to a contact.

items.name: static let copyToPasteboard: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the pasteboard.

items.name: static let mail: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to a new email message.

items.name: static let markupAsPDF: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that marks up the provided content as a PDF file.

items.name: static let message: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the Messages app.

items.name: static let openInIBooks: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that opens the content in iBooks.

items.name: static let postToFacebook: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s wall on Facebook.

items.name: static let postToFlickr: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided image to the user’s Flickr account.

items.name: static let postToTencentWeibo: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s Tencent Weibo feed.

items.name: static let postToTwitter: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s Twitter feed.

items.name: static let postToVimeo: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided video to the user’s Vimeo account.

items.name: static let postToWeibo: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s Weibo feed.

items.name: static let print: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that prints the provided content.

items.name: static let saveToCameraRoll: UIActivity.ActivityType
items.desc: A type of activity that assigns the image or video to the user’s camera roll.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
